name: lockor
description: Prevent Cursor from changing certain files - a simple file locker for VS Code and Cursor

lockor.showStatusBarItem.description: Show lock status in status bar

lockor.showNotifications.description: Show notifications when attempting to modify locked files

enumDescriptions: Soft: Gentle warnings for everyone, no save blocking, gentle AI discouragement
AI-Aware: Human can save with warnings, AI strictly blocked (recommended)
Hard: Everyone blocked, OS read-only + save blocking + strict AI rules

lockor.addVisibleMarkers.description: Add visible lock comments to the top of locked files (aggressive AI warning)
lockor.addVisibleMarkers.markdownDescription: **Warning:** This modifies your files by adding lock comments. Only enable if you want maximum AI visibility.

lockor.createStatusFile.description: Create .lockor status file in workspace root
lockor.createStatusFile.markdownDescription: Creates a `.lockor` YAML file in the workspace root listing all locked files. This provides a clear record of protected files that AI tools and developers can reference.
